title: Multimedia-Based Instructional Design for Raising Awareness of Smart Board Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: A non-degree program for adult learners conducted in a constrained technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more educational use cases of smart boards
Learners can recognize the effectiveness of multimedia materials based on the ADDIE model at over 90%
Learners can evaluate content designed according to Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction with over 80% satisfaction

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
